From December 1990 to May 1991, he was the 22th Prime Minister of South Korea.http://m.skyedaily.com/news_view.html?ID=45964 He was born in Changwon, South Gyeongsang Province. ==References== Category:1936 births Category:2024 deaths Category:Prime Ministers of South Korea
